alert.note: Alert for Ford; Gray (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 7:41PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Ford and east central Gray Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 741 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cimarron, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Howell around 800 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Dodge City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southwestern Kansas.
